name: Evil Labs
description: Evil Labs is a game about building and managing your own Evil Laboratory. Research and develop diseases, infect people, sell the cure and get rich!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or greater Processor: 2.0 Ghz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9.0c Compatible Card DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 600 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: 2.0 Ghz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 10 Compatible Card DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 600 MB available space
